channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 9 Best Sunscreens, WIRED Tested and Reviewed
item.description: We spent all summer road-testing sunscreen, from mineral and chemical to tinted and spray versions. These are our top picks in each category.

item.title: High-End Fashion Dupes Are Soaring Where Knock-Offs Never Could
item.description: High-quality imitations of luxury products are rising, and people aren't ashamed to buy them anymore. How do designer brands retain their appeal?

item.title: 8 Best Electric Cargo Bikes for Families (2024)
item.description: We’ve spent years riding and testing extra-large ebikes, perfect for hauling both your little ones and groceries around town.

item.title: TikTok’s research reportedly acknowledges negative effects on teens
item.description: Court documents suggest that TikTok executives are aware of the app’s potential harm to teenagers, according to reporting by NPR and Kentucky Public R...

item.title: Meta’s Yann LeCun says worries about A.I.’s existential threat are ‘complete B.S.’
item.description: AI pioneer Yann LeCun doesn’t think artificial intelligence is actually on the verge of becoming intelligent. LeCun — a professor at New York Universi...

item.title: Tesla’s Cybercab robotaxi is here — and it could cost less than $30K
item.description: Welcome back to Week in Review. This week, we’re taking a closer look at Tesla’s Cybercab and Robovan reveals, the “complete disarray” at Fisker HQ, a...

item.title: How to Stop Your Data From Being Used to Train AI
item.description: Some companies let you opt out of allowing your content to be used for generative AI. Here’s how to take back (at least a little) control from ChatGPT...

item.title: SpaceX will attempt historic catch of returning Starship booster on Sunday
item.description: Starship is ready to fly again — and for the first time, SpaceX is going to try to bring the booster back to the launch site to catch it with a pair o...

item.title: Lenovo ThinkBook Plus (Gen 5) Review: A Windows and Android Hybrid
item.description: This hybrid Windows/Android 2-in-1 mashup is cool, expensive, and confusing.

item.title: In latest move against WP Engine, WordPress takes control of ACF plugin
item.description: The dispute between WordPress founder Matt Mullenweg and hosting provider WP Engine continues, with Mullenweg announcing that WordPress is “forking” a...
